OOC: Tell me how you like this char introduction post

:::Orion:::

::A spaceship took of from the planet Omniscia.  Omniscia was the fourth 
planet of the Draziw system, in the Andromeda galaxy.  Inside the ship was a 
young teenage boy bot named Orion.  he had left Omniscia after overhearing 
his parents mentioning a great war on the planet called Earth.  Earth, the 
blue planet, the planet where his parents fell in love.  Orion never enjoyed 
living on the planet Ominscia.  As  his mother had said,"if only Orion had 
other Transformers his age to play with".  Having no friends when he was a 
child did not help his attitude.  he grew to be strong and stubburn, and yet 
his love for his family was great.  Orion decided he would join the Maximals 
on earth, and find his fathers best friends, which included his uncle.  he 
had been flying for many lightyears, when he finally reached Earth.  he took 
a moment to marvel at it, and than fly into its atmosphere.  he found the 
Maximal base his father always talked about, the Cybertronian Fire, and 
opened up his comm::
Orion: May i join you? My name is Orion, son of Bluestreak and Andromeda.

--part1_44.8ef9fe3.2748aba7_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
